description.ko: 위성 관점에서 포착한 지구 표면의 복잡하고 다양한 질감을 고해상도로 탐구하며, 자연적인 지질학적 예술성을 강조합니다.
description.en: A high-resolution visual exploration of the intricate and diverse textures that define the Earth's surface, captured from a satellite perspective to highlight natural geological artistry.

prompt: Ultra-detailed satellite photography of diverse Earth terrain textures, featuring cracked desert salt flats transitioning into lush river deltas, deep oceanic ridges, and jagged snowy mountain peaks, top-down macro perspective, high resolution, 8k, realistic geological patterns, vibrant natural colors, cinematic lighting.
